65.eng-name: Prophetic Commentary on the Qur'an (Tafseer of the Prophet (pbuh))

hadiths.text: Narrated Ibn `Abbas:Qur'an 28.85'...will bring you home' means to Mecca

chapter.ara-name: باب {إِنَّ الَّذِي فَرَضَ عَلَيْكَ الْقُرْآنَ} الآيَةَ
chapter.eng-name: "Verily, He Who has given you (O Muḥammad ﷺ) the Qur'an..." (V.28:85)
